content:
Yes, there have been many comic book series that have been adapted into TV shows over the years. Here are just a few examples:

1. The Walking Dead: The popular zombie comic book series was adapted into a highly successful TV show on AMC.

2. The Flash: One of DC Comics' most popular characters, The Flash has had multiple TV shows over the years, including the current CW series.

3. Supergirl: Another DC Comics character, Supergirl has had several TV series over the years, including the current CW series.

4. The Umbrella Academy: This popular comic book series from Gerard Way was recently adapted into a TV series on Netflix.

5. Preacher: The Vertigo comic book series was adapted into a TV show on AMC.

These are just a few examples, there are many other comic book series that have been adapted into successful TV shows over the years.
